stepsSubTitle2: With just a few simple steps you will be live streaming to your website automatically every time you go live.

benefitList.title: Time Saver
benefitList.subTitle: Stop wasting time updating embed codes every time you want to go live.

benefitList.title: Increase Your Viewership
benefitList.subTitle: Embed Facebook Live on your website and reach the 30% who don't have a Facebook account.

benefitList.title: Distraction Free
benefitList.subTitle: There are a lot of distractions on social media websites. Keep your audience focused on your website.

featuresSubTitle: We've added some great features to help save you time and keep your audience informed and engaged.

featuresList.title: Automatic Start "Near Instant"
featuresList.subTitle: No page refresh required, video starts automatically. 0 - 5 second delay.

featuresList.title: Previous Video Carousel
featuresList.subTitle: Beautifully showcase and play your previous videos.

featuresList.title: Facebook Pages
featuresList.subTitle: Stream Live from your Facebook Business and Organizational Pages.

featuresList.title: Last Recorded Live Placeholder
featuresList.subTitle: Show your last uploaded video when you are not live.

featuresList.title: Custom Placeholder Image
featuresList.subTitle: Add your own custom placeholder image when your video is not live.

featuresList.title: Wordpress Plugin
featuresList.subTitle: If you are a WordPress user, try our

stories.title: Worry Free
stories.subTitle1: Say goodbye to manually updating your live embed codes and say hello to your new
stories.subTitle2: hassle free, one-time, live embed code.
stories.subTitle3: Embed just once and you are done. Auto starts every time.

stories.title: Church Services
stories.subTitle1: Do you live stream church services? Churches all over the world are using VidLive to embed church services on their website.
stories.subTitle3: Save time. Reach more parishioners. It's so easy!

outroSubTitle: The easy way to embed live streams on your website and grow your audience.
outroSubTitle2: Give it a try for free! 7 day trial.
